EmailTemplate.name: CSM Power Spec Completed Template
EmailTemplate.subject: Your request{!Case.CaseNumber} has been completed for PowerSpec
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
Your request for PowerSpec has been completed. To activate your licenses please complete the following process: • Make sure you are connected to the Internet • Open the PowerSpec Program • Go to Advanced -> Licensing -> Obtain
Issues/Question Summary: {!Case.Subject}
Your license status message will now state: Licensed
If you have any issues, please contact: powerspec.support@cummins.com
This auto-generated e-mail was sent from Cummins.
